name: Helene Bertrand
what_you_do: Hélène Bertrand is a physician who has concentrated on treating painful conditions in the last 12 of her 55-year medical practice.
social_proof: Hélène Bertrand received her MD from McGill University in 1965, at age 22. She has developed a mannitol containing cream able to calm the nerves that send pain and itch messages to the brain, and found new solutions to many painful conditions including low back pain.
signature_programs: Hélène Bertrand's newest book addresses low back pain with a simple 2-minute exercise anyone can do to solve their low back pain without surgery or medication.
business_focus: Treating painful conditions and developing solutions, including a cream and a book on low back pain relief.
service_provided: Pain relief solutions, low back pain relief
